Text:
A great book people would be interested in would be the book,
Basic Training For Revolutionaries. It was once in hard copy format and then it was banned. You can read more about it here.

http://www.realoathkeepers.org/join/basic-training/

basic training for revolutionaries is all about a jewish conspiracy to take over the world and how the jewish are a weak, useless people. the author is some white supremist nazi bitch. I know because i followed the link and thats the piece of shit book it led me to.
